article.name: Render Setup
article.description:
This script revolves around a particle generator core created by TomC, but a lot of the code is definitely mine, I rewrote TomC\'s functions into a rendering script that allows scaling and positioning of the image so that high res images can be produced from the rendering elements.
It still requires some work, I don\'t consider it perfect, but its a handy step forward in making apparently big things using the processing power of a PC.
article.keywords: mkv25, dot, net, mkv25.net, john, beech, markavian, portfolio, junk, stuff, showcase, artwork, paint shop pro, flash, macromedia, 3dsmax, 3d studio, artwork, digital, design, mkv
